channel.title: Addamant platebody (g) weird
channel.description:
Ok, guys i know it's basic in your source that you wil have it but i need it for something tell me why i don't see a correct platebody and how i get it in right position not in hand mode but in helm mode.. How i fix the look so it's a platebody again it's now invisible a part.. I got it from the itemdump...
[img]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/272/errorwd.jpg[/img]
Thanks runb4
